attributes.action: For Facebook to drop it's law against adding you do not know.
attributes.additional_details:
I do not understand why Facebook have a law against adding people you do not know.
Many people on Facebook do not like this law either. Not all networks have this rule. I don't think MySpace or Twitter do.
How are you supposed to meet anyone new?
If it is really that wrong then why do Facebook allow you to recommend friends and even recommend friends themselves? I have even been blocked for adding recommendations.
How do Facebook know someone is telling the truth? I heard one day that someone got blocked for adding his cousin.
What if you find an old friend there who just does not remember you? (you are going to get blocked for doing nothing wrong).
If you agree that this law is unjust then please sign.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Facebook.
